Job Title: ML-Ops Engineer
Location: Irving, TX or Basking Ridge, NJ or Tampa, FL (hybrid role)
Duration: Longterm Contract

Mandatory skillset: Customer is stringent on GCP model deployment experience.
- Cron jobs
- Shell scripts
- Deploy models
- Python
- CI/CD pipeline: Terraform, Ansible
- Spark/PySpark hands-on experience

Experience candidate in ML-Ops, mainly to optimize multiple ML models and create efficient ML models?
- Hands-on with LLMs and optimize LLMs.
- Experience on GCP services.
- Extensive hands-on Pytorch and TensorFlow. Which to use? In what scenarios?
- GPU efficient usage and optimization of resources.
- Hands-on on different ML models creation.
- How to tune different parameters in ML models? And in LLMs?
- Exposure to create data pipelines in ML is also required.
- Exposure to prompt engineering as well.
- Exposure to AI tools in GCP like Vertex AI, etc. required.
- Hands-on in Jupyter Lab required.

Customer is looking for someone who can independently work & solve different problems from downstream applications and efficiently use the ML-Ops, AI/ML Models LMS and optimize them.
